description: This is a compiled source file for the AppGateway plugin component of a larger project, specifically implementing core functionality and responder mechanisms for the plugin. It includes multiple source files related to the AppGateway module.

classes.name: AppGateway
classes.description: Main class implementing the AppGateway plugin functionalities, including responder handling and module management.

methods.name: Initialize
methods.description: Initializes the AppGateway plugin, setting up necessary resources and responders.

methods.name: HandleRequest
methods.description: Handles incoming requests to the plugin, dispatching to appropriate responders.
